name: Upload a new click conversion into Google Ads from a new record in Airtable
description:
Please disable your ad blockers when working with our Google Ads apps. The ad blockers may cause unexpected behavior.

This template regularly checks for new records in an Airtable table and uses the retrieved information to upload conversions to Google Ads.

Your Airtable table needs to have at least these columns:
1) Conversion date time in a YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss format
2) Google Click ID
3) A column either with a creation or a last modified timestamp. 

Then you can provide these optional columns:
1) Order ID (if you plan to make conversion adjustments later)
2) Conversion Value
3) Currency Code

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template by clicking the clock icon on the first module.
